Copacabana.title: Copacabana
Copacabana.byline: Copacabana is a small town on the Bolivian shore of Lake Titicaca.

Copán Ruinas.title: Copán Ruinas
Copán Ruinas.byline: Copán was one of the great centers of Maya civilization over a thousand years ago.

Copenhagen.title: Copenhagen
Copenhagen.byline: Copenhagen (Danish: København) is the capital city of Denmark and forms the moderate conurbation that one million Danes call home.

Copper Canyon.title: Copper Canyon
Copper Canyon.byline: Copper Canyon (Spanish: Barranca del Cobre) is a canyon system in the Sierra Tarahumara in the southwestern part of the state of Chihuahua in Mexico.

Copper Harbor.title: Copper Harbor
Copper Harbor.byline: Copper Harbor is the northernmost city in Michigan, in the Upper Peninsula.

Copper Mountain.title: Copper Mountain
Copper Mountain.byline: Copper Mountain is a ski resort in Colorado.
